title: Adult obesity prevalence (aged 18 years and over)

editions.title: Adult obesity prevalence (aged 18 years and over)
editions.summary: Percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity, England, 16/11/2015-15/11/2016 to 16/11/2021-15/11/2022.
editions.description:
Percentage of adults aged 18 and over classified as living with obesity, in England, for 16/11/2015-15/11/2016 to 16/11/2021-15/11/2022.

Coverage
England

Geography definition
Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Regions,
Combined Authorities,
Nation (England)

Source
England: [Office for Health Improvement and Disparities]

Source Notes and Caveats
Adults are defined as obese if their body mass index (BMI) is greater than or equal to 30kg/mÂ²
